document_data.caption: Delvar Ironfist (here pictured with an arrow to the knee)
document_data.name: Delvar Ironfist
document_data.mainbody: '''Delvar Ironfist''' was an [[adventuring]] [[dwarf]] [[fighter]] in the mid-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Delvar was young-looking, with a full, brown beard.
document_data.Possessions: Of note, he was armed with a battle axe.
document_data.Activities: He was an adventurer. He sometimes still drank with his friend Gart.
document_data.Relationships:
Delvar was a friend of [[Gart Stonenose]], whom he used to adventure with.

The adventuring party he was a part of in Freedale included him alongside [[Beldar]], [[Silverleaf Halfmoon]], [[Morganth]], [[Slinker]], and [[Lordan]].
document_data.History:
Prior to Gart settling in, he and Delvar used to adventure together.

In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Delvar Ironfist was part of an adventuring group in [[Freedale]] that may have rescued [[Taran Goldenstar]], recovered the ''[[Orb of dragonkind]]'', faced [[Gunter Weiss]] in [[Harrow Hill]], and perhaps explored [[Azazabus]]' dungeon under [[Mount Dread]].
